Get Started

Empowering Your Health Journey

MiKare Health is the smart, family-friendly app that helps you track symptoms, detect patterns, and understand your health with clarity and confidence.

Get Started Our Story
Our Core Values

At MiKare Health, our core values guide our mission and shape our commitment to empowering health journeys for all.

Empathy

We prioritise understanding and compassion in healthcare, ensuring every individual feels heard and supported throughout their health journey.

Innovation

We embrace cutting-edge technology and continuous improvement to provide transformative solutions that enhance and simplify health management.

Integrity

We are committed to transparency and trust, ensuring that our users feel secure and confident while navigating their health information.

Key Features

Discover the powerful tools designed to transform how you manage and understand your family's health.

Symptom Tracking

Record and monitor symptoms with detailed logs that help identify patterns over time.

Health Insights

Get meaningful insights from your health data to better understand your wellbeing.

Family Profiles

Manage health records for your entire family in one secure, organised place.

Health Timeline

View your complete health history in a comprehensive, easy-to-navigate timeline.

Appointment Prep

Generate summaries and prepare questions for more productive healthcare appointments.

Secure Storage

Your health data is encrypted and protected with enterprise-grade security.

"MiKare Health transforms how you manage family healthcare. The insights and timeline make it effortless to stay organised and informed."

Take Charge of Your Health

Join MiKare Health today and empower yourself with the tools needed to manage your health and wellbeing effectively.
